name: refortification
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the act of fortifying something (= making it stronger, especially in order to protect it) for a second, third, etc. time: Further refortification came in the 1580s, when the town was considered to be in the frontline against a possible attack. He advocated a policy of commercial development combined with the re-fortification of a vastly expanded city. Cairo's medieval history is the product of several urban relocations, refortifications, and competing religious communities.
